metadata.title: 1000 Jewels Luck o The Irish 4 Leaf Clover Charm Pendant 316L Stainless Steel, 0470
features: The perfect pendant for Saint Patricks Day!
Made with solid 316L Surgical Stainless Steel so you know that it's made to last!
Add a touch 'o the Irish to your wardrobe!
description: Add some fun and seasonal spirit with our Luck 'o the Irish 4 Leaf Clover Charm pendant. Made with handsome and durable 316L Stainless Steel and polished to a brilliant finish, you know that it's one pendant that's made to last. Works equally well with casual and more formal attire and is a great gift idea for men and women alike!
